name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Postilize - Digital Assistant with the Best Business Tactics

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Digital Assistant with the Best Business Tactics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a companion productivity tool for creating virtual assistants on the Postilize platform, that brings added functionality from Postilize into LinkedIn.

Features:
- Seamless integration with your Postilize account
- Create and manage virtual assistants
- Additional Postilize tools within LinkedIn

Boost your efficiency and productivity on LinkedIn with Postilize. Install now and transform your LinkedIn workflow.
